title: Claimed by a Vampire: An Erotic Lesbian Tale
description:
Now Anna has a whole new reason to love the night...
Once Anna was just a regular girl working nights as a bartender and dancing at the club on her nights off. But everything changed when she was brutally attacked one night. Luckily, a mysterious and beautiful woman came to her rescue and saved her life. From that moment on, Anna couldn't get her mind off this powerful, almost unearthly individual. Too bad she'd probably never see her again...Isadora's existence as a vampire had become meaningless long ago. But when she warded off another of her kind to save a captivating young woman's life, she changed things more than she could have ever imagined. Watching over this woman and acting as her invisible protector, she yearned to close the distance between them. But Isadora knew that monsters like her should stay in the shadows."Claimed by a Vampire" is a steamy story of sexual nature meant only for those 18+.This ebook includes a 14,000 word novella containing lesbian supernatural and paranormal erotica and romance, strap-on, and BDSM themes such as orgasm denial, edging, and dominance.
author: Vera Hunt
